org.opentcs.access

Interface SharedKernelProvider


  • public interface SharedKernelProvider
    Pools access to a kernel for multiple clients.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Kernel getKernel()
      Deprecated. 
      Use register() to register and returned SharedKernelClient to provide kernel and unregister instead.
      java.lang.String getKernelDescription()
      Returns a description for the kernel currently being shared.
      boolean kernelShared()
      Checks whether a kernel reference is currently being shared.
      default SharedKernelClient register()
      Creates and registers a new client with this access pool.
      boolean register(java.lang.Object client)
      Deprecated. 
      Use register() to register and returned SharedKernelClient to provide kernel and unregister instead.
      boolean unregister(java.lang.Object client)
      Deprecated. 
      Use register() to register and returned SharedKernelClient to provide kernel and unregister instead.

    • Method Detail

      • register

        @Deprecated
 @ScheduledApiChange(when="5.0",
                    details="Method will be removed.")
boolean register(java.lang.Object client)
        Deprecated. Use register() to register and returned SharedKernelClient to provide kernel and unregister instead.
        Registers the given client object with this access pool.
        Parameters:
        client - The client to be registered.
        Returns:
        true if, and only if, the client was successfully registered and wasn't registered before.

      • register

        @ScheduledApiChange(when="5.0",
                    details="Default implementation will be removed.")
default SharedKernelClient register()
                                                                                                                                      throws KernelUnavailableException
        Creates and registers a new client with this access pool. This is a convenience method that supports try-with-ressources and does not require a preexisting client.
        Returns:
        the new client
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - in case of connection falure with Kernel.
        KernelUnavailableException

      • unregister

        @Deprecated
 @ScheduledApiChange(when="5.0",
                    details="Method will be removed.")
boolean unregister(java.lang.Object client)
        Deprecated. Use register() to register and returned SharedKernelClient to provide kernel and unregister instead.
        Unregisters the given client object with this access pool.
        Parameters:
        client - The client to be unregistered.
        Returns:
        true if, and only if, the client was successfully unregistered and was registered before.

      • getKernel

        @Deprecated
 @ScheduledApiChange(when="5.0",
                    details="Method will be removed.")
Kernel getKernel()
        Deprecated. Use register() to register and returned SharedKernelClient to provide kernel and unregister instead.
        Returns a reference to the pooled kernel.
        Returns:
        A reference to the pooled kernel.

      • kernelShared

        boolean kernelShared()
        Checks whether a kernel reference is currently being shared.
        Returns:
        true if, and only if, a kernel reference is currently being shared, meaning that at least one client is registered and a usable kernel reference exists.

      • getKernelDescription

        java.lang.String getKernelDescription()
        Returns a description for the kernel currently being shared.
        Returns:
        A description for the kernel currently being shared, or the empty string, if none is currently being shared.
